price: 34. Mpe totiaki okati na yango (mabele) bilanga ya naghil(1) mpe a’náb(2) mpe tobimiselaki yango maziba ya mayi,
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا فِيهَا جَنَّٰتٖ مِّن نَّخِيلٖ وَأَعۡنَٰبٖ وَفَجَّرۡنَا فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلۡعُيُونِ
footnotes:
1 Naghil: Bótala yango na Al-Baqarah: 266. Na suratu Al-An’ám: 99.
2 A’nab: Bótala yango na Al-Baqarah: 266. Na suratu Al-An’ám: 99.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā fīhā jannātin min nakhīlin wa-aʿnābin wafajjarnā fīhā mina al-ʿuyūni
translations: and We caused to gush forth
